headline: China’s state oil firms halt Russian oil buys after sanctions, Reuters reports
summary: Investing.com -- Chinese state-owned oil giants have halted purchases of seaborne Russian crude following new U.S. sanctions targeting Rosneft and Lukoil, Moscow’s two largest oil producers, according to a report by Reuters on Thursday.

content.title: China’s state oil firms halt Russian oil buys after sanctions, Reuters reports

headline: Colgate-Palmolive (CL): Assessing Valuation as Analysts Weigh Sector Pressures Ahead of Q3 Earnings
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) is drawing extra attention from investors this week as several analyst firms maintain a cautiously optimistic stance in spite of ongoing sector challenges, just ahead of the company’s third-quarter earnings report. See our latest analysis for Colgate-Palmolive. Despite a challenging year for consumer staples, Colgate-Palmolive’s share price has slipped 11.8% year-to-date, reflecting investor caution.
